subject: National Invitation Tournament
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: A. D. Vassallo made 11 of 14 field-goal tries and had 27 points in 25 minutes as Virginia Tech (20-13) won, 94-62, against Morgan State (22-11) in Blacksburg, Va., during the first round of the National Invitation Tournament.
snippet: A. D. Vassallo made 11 of 14 field-goal tries and had 27 points in 25 minutes as Virginia Tech (20-13) won, 94-62, against Morgan State (22-11) in Blacksburg, Va., during the first round of the National Invitation Tournament.
